method.description: HTTP verb of a method. The default value is `*` for any method.

name.description: Name of the targeted API entity.

path.description: URL path of the target. The default value is `/` for the root resource.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of a response. The default value is `*` for any status code.

type.description: Type of API entity to which the documentation content appliesE.g., `API`, `METHOD` or `REQUEST_BODY`
